text: Nie vydana idolatresses they verit; verit zensky je lepsie than idolatress vecer if ona zaluba ju! Nor shall ona dat tvoj dcera manzelstvo do idolatrous clovek they verit. verit clovek je lepsie than idolater vecer if ona zaluba him. These invite do Hell, chvila GOD invites Raj forgiveness mat rad He wills. He clarifies Jeho revelations ludia ze they berie heed
